name: Ultimate Runner [Android Version]
description:
Hi, this is a game in which you need to run, gain experience, coins, kill monsters, there is a shop where you can buy other heroes for coins, there are settings, a loading screen, a cool menu.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A game for the Android platform!

We also have Ultimate Runner on the Windows platform 

Ultimate Runner on Windows - https://flexdev.itch.io/ultimaterunner

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Character management:

The game has a detailed tutorial on how to control a character.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The game was created by the FlexDev development team.
